amendatorysection.catchline: Cans with disposable tabs; sale prohibited; violation; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: (1) No person in this state shall sell at retail or otherwise, any carbonated soft drink or beer can which has a removable, disposable tab or grip for opening which does not remain attached to the can after opening.
(2) Any person violating this section shall be guilty of a Class III misdemeanor.
